item.title: Economic policy, growth, and human flourishing
item.description: What do scientific innovation, economic policy, GDP, employment, and entrepreneurship have to do with increasing flourishing at scale? Iâ€™ve put a pin in this project for now, and I’m parking my observations, questions for further research and brief summaries of some key readings here. Observations I noticed two schools of thought emerge from my research. The first, Camp Progress, is intensely considered with raising living standards, and supporting a talented elite driving this forward for all of society.
